wisdom.sentence: A gambler's biggest thrill is winning a bet. His next biggest thrill is losing a bet.
A nickel ain't worth a dime anymore.
wisdom.author: Yogi Berra

wisdom.sentence: All bridge hands are equally likely, but some are more equally likely than others.
wisdom.author: Alan Truscott

wisdom.sentence: Although golf was originally restricted to wealthy, overweight Protestants, today it's open to anybody who owns hideous clothing.
wisdom.author: Dave Barry

wisdom.sentence: [Babe] Ruth made a big mistake when he gave up pitching.
wisdom.author: Tris Speaker, 1921

wisdom.sentence: Bill Dickey is learning me his experience.
wisdom.author: Yogi Berra in his rookie season.

wisdom.sentence: Check me if I'm wrong, Sandy, but if I kill all the golfers... they're gonna lock me up and throw away the key!
Don't let go of what you've got hold of, until you have hold of something else.
wisdom.author: First Rule of Wing Walking

wisdom.sentence: Ever feel like life was a game and you had the wrong instruction book?
Ever feel like you're the head pin on life's bowling alley, and everyone's rolling strikes?
Every creature has within him the wild, uncontrollable urge to punt.
wisdom.author: Snoopy

wisdom.sentence: Flying is the second greatest feeling you can have.  The greatest feeling? Landing...  Landing is the greatest feeling you can have.
Football builds self-discipline.  What else would induce a spectator to sit out in the open in subfreezing weather?
Football combines the two worst features of American life. It is violence punctuated by committee meetings.
wisdom.author: George F. Will, "Men At Work:  The Craft of Baseball"

wisdom.sentence: Football is a game designed to keep coalminers off the streets.
wisdom.author: Jimmy Breslin

wisdom.sentence: FORTUNE'S FUN FACTS TO KNOW AND TELL:  #14  The Baby Ruth candy bar was not named after George Herman "The Babe" Ruth, but after the oldest daughter of President Grover Cleveland.
From 0 to "what seems to be the problem officer" in 8.3 seconds.
wisdom.author: Ad for the new VW Corrado

wisdom.sentence: Give a man a fish, and you feed him for a day. Teach a man to fish, and he'll invite himself over for dinner.
wisdom.author: Calvin Keegan

wisdom.sentence: Give me a fish and I will eat today.  Teach me to fish and I will eat forever.
Go directly to jail.  Do not pass Go, do not collect $200.
Horse sense is the thing a horse has which keeps it from betting on people.
wisdom.author: W. C. Fields

wisdom.sentence: How can you think and hit at the same time?
wisdom.author: Yogi Berra

wisdom.sentence: I always turn to the sports pages first, which record people's accomplishments. The front page has nothing but man's failures.
wisdom.author: Chief Justice Earl Warren

wisdom.sentence: I believe that professional wrestling is clean and everything else in the world is fixed.
wisdom.author: Frank Deford, sports writer

wisdom.sentence: I can't decide whether to commit suicide or go bowling.
wisdom.author: Florence Henderson

wisdom.sentence: I guess the Little League is even littler than we thought.
wisdom.author: D. Cavett

wisdom.sentence: I just know I'm a better manager when I have Joe DiMaggio in center field.
wisdom.author: Casey Stengel

wisdom.sentence: I like your game but we have to change the rules.
I never met a man I didn't want to fight.
wisdom.author: Lyle Alzado, professional football lineman

wisdom.sentence: I went to the race track once and bet on a horse that was so good that it took seven others to beat him!
I would rather say that a desire to drive fast sports cars is what sets man apart from the animals.
I'd rather push my Harley than ride a rice burner.
I'm a lucky guy, and I'm happy to be with the Yankees. And I want to thank everyone for making this night necessary.
wisdom.author: Yogi Berra at a dinner in his honor

wisdom.sentence: I'm glad we don't have to play in the shade.
wisdom.author: Golfer Bobby Jones on being told that it was 105 degrees      in the shade.

wisdom.sentence: I've only got 12 cards.
If people concentrated on the really important things in life, there'd be a shortage of fishing poles.
wisdom.author: Doug Larson

wisdom.sentence: If swimming is so good for your figure, how come whales look the way they do?
If you don't know what game you're playing, don't ask what the score is.
If you sit down at a poker game and don't see a sucker, get up.  You're the sucker.
If you want to see card tricks, you have to expect to take cards.
wisdom.author: Harry Blackstone

wisdom.sentence: If you're carrying a torch, put it down.  The Olympics are over.

In Africa some of the native tribes have a custom of beating the ground with clubs and uttering spine chilling cries.  Anthropologists call this a form of primitive self-expression.  In America we call it golf.
In Brooklyn, we had such great pennant races, it made the World Series just something that came later.
wisdom.author: Walter O'Malley, Dodgers owner

wisdom.sentence: It gets late early out there.
wisdom.author: Yogi Berra

wisdom.sentence: It has long been known that one horse can run faster than another -- but which one? Differences are crucial.
wisdom.author: Lazarus Long

wisdom.sentence: It's like deja vu all over again.
wisdom.author: Yogi Berra

wisdom.sentence: It's not whether you win or lose but how you played the game.
wisdom.author: Grantland Rice

wisdom.sentence: It's not whether you win or lose, it's how you look playing the game.
Keep grandma off the streets -- legalize bingo.
Life is a gamble at terrible odds, if it was a bet you wouldn't take it.
wisdom.author: Tom Stoppard, "Rosencrantz and Guildenstern are Dead"

wisdom.sentence: Life is a game of bridge -- and you've just been finessed.
Life is a yo-yo, and mankind ties knots in the string.
Look, we play the Star Spangled Banner before every game.  You want us to pay income taxes, too?
wisdom.author: Bill Veeck, Chicago White Sox

wisdom.sentence: Love means nothing to a tennis player.
Max told his friend that he'd just as soon not go hiking in the hills. Said he, "I'm an anti-climb Max."  [So is that punchline.]
Most people's favorite way to end a game is by winning.
My way of joking is to tell the truth. That's the funniest joke in the world.
wisdom.author: Muhammad Ali

wisdom.sentence: Nadia Comaneci, simple perfection.
wisdom.author: '76 Olympics

wisdom.sentence: Never play pool with anyone named "Fats".
NEWS FLASH!! Today the East German pole-vault champion became the West German pole-vault champion.
Nothing increases your golf score like witnesses.
Now there's three things you can do in a baseball game: you can win or you can lose or it can rain.
wisdom.author: Casey Stengel

wisdom.sentence: On Thanksgiving Day all over America, families sit down to dinner at the same moment -- halftime.
One thought driven home is better than three left on base.
One way to stop a runaway horse is to bet on him.
P-K4
Repel them.  Repel them.  Induce them to relinquish the spheroid.
wisdom.author: Indiana University football cheer

wisdom.sentence: Reporter:   "What would you do if you found a million dollars?" Yogi Berra: "If the guy was poor, I would give it back."
Rube Walker: "Hey, Yogi, what time is it?" Yogi Berra:  "You mean now?"
Sailing is fun, but scrubbing the decks is aardvark.
wisdom.author: Heard on Noahs' ark

wisdom.sentence: Show me a good loser in professional sports and I'll show you an idiot. Show me a good sportsman and I'll show you a player I'm looking to trade.
wisdom.author: Leo Durocher

wisdom.sentence: So I'm ugly.  So what? I never saw anyone hit with his face.
wisdom.author: Yogi Berra

wisdom.sentence: Support Bingo, keep Grandma off the streets.
Teamwork is essential -- it allows you to blame someone else.
That's the true harbinger of spring, not crocuses or swallows returning to Capistrano, but the sound of a bat on a ball.
wisdom.author: Bill Veeck

wisdom.sentence: The one sure way to make a lazy man look respectable is to put a fishing rod in his hand.
The real problem with hunting elephants is carrying the decoys.
The surest way to remain a winner is to win once, and then not play any more.
The urge to gamble is so universal and its practice so pleasurable that I assume it must be evil.
wisdom.author: Heywood Broun

wisdom.sentence: The whole of life is futile unless you consider it as a sporting proposition.
They also surf who only stand on waves.
To be sure of hitting the target, shoot first and, whatever you hit, call it the target.
Trust everybody, but cut the cards.
wisdom.author: Finlay Peter Dunne, "Mr. Dooley's Philosophy"

wisdom.sentence: Two brothers, Mort and Bill, like to sail.  While Bill has a great deal of experience, he certainly isn't the rigger Mort is.
When in doubt, lead trump.
Winning isn't everything, but losing isn't anything.
Winning isn't everything.  It's the only thing.
wisdom.author: Vince Lombardi

wisdom.sentence: Woman:     "Is Yoo-Hoo hyphenated?" Yogi Berra: "No, ma'am, its not even carbonated."
